articles.description:
Re - 获得牌照其中一大好处是打通了香港的银行体系，令合规交易所在 OTC 方面比较有优势
- 据个人观察，目前在法规底下，香港最受关注的是稳定币与 RWA，对 DeFi 迟疑的原因是因为“旅行规则”，Uniswap 等 DEX 模式让你无法进行 KYC 与填写交易对手方信息。https://www.hkvax.com/

articles.author: 吴说区块链
articles.description:
香港第三家获得虚拟资产交易平台牌照原则批准（AIP）的 HKVAX CSO Matthew Cheung 对吴说介绍：
- 香港 SFC 对牌照的审批非常严格，申请过程中回答了过千条问题，FTX 暴雷后尤其重视托管方面的问题
- 在香港孵化的 HKVAX 过去完成了两次融资，有来自香港上市公司及家族办公室的投资方

articles.description:
It’s notable $btc is basically flat given how strong the dollar has been past month…

Le Shrub🌳🔥🇺🇦: Chart of the month is $DXY
It has this “Dinosaur” formation with the 200 dma acting as resistance at the top.
If it sells off here, then the algos will get really confused 🥹

articles.author: Surfer
articles.description:
RT Jebus.eth
Even 14 IQ anti crypto people get it.
If you're voting for the dems you are explicitly voting against our interests


John Reed Stark: Will the SEC Approve Any Of The Recent Bitcoin Spot ETF Applications?
People often ask for my opinion on whether the SEC will approve any of the recent spate of bitcoin spot ETF applications, which is an interesting and important question.
My take is that the current SEC will…
articles.title: RT Jebus.eth: Even 14 IQ anti crypto people get it. If you're voting for the dems you are explicitly voting against our interests

articles.author: Surfer
articles.description:
This is one thing that makes crypto unusual. Retail can get returns captured by VCs in any other space

Sisyphus: All the big token wins of the year, where you could have made zero-to-one money in crypto, were bootstrapped companies with zero VC funding
articles.title: This is one thing that makes crypto unusual. Retail can get returns captured by VCs in any other space

articles.author: Surfer
articles.description:
RT Gabor Gurbacs
The average U.S. annual income in 1971 paid off a house in ~2.5 years, could buy 3 new cars in a year, send 4 kids to Harvard in a year and easily afford food, shelter, necessities and entertainment.
The older generation doesn’t understand the difficulties the young face today.

articles.description:
Is RLB functionally any different than what Binance did with BNB on its way to $80B mkt cap?

salience: think rlb has entered the commencement of a ponzu cycle
functionally if you think about it, why does a casino need to b&b their own token - maybe marketing yeah 
if it sounds too good to be true, it is but — it probably still runs till one day and poof
